Download and flash RC2 image Install into PiZeroW and connect to PC Setup network and login via SSH
Expected behavior I am guessing it is suppose to look like this: Linux pwnagotchi 4.19.66-Re4son+ <denchmark-link:https://github.com/evilsocket/pwnagotchi/pull/1>#1</denchmark-link> Sun Aug 18 13:42:02 AEST 2019 armv6l (◕‿‿◕) pwnagotchi (pwnagotchi-v1.0.0RC2) May be a putty issue??

comments.comment: This is not a problem of Pwnagotchi, it is a problem of Putty. It works on other SSH clients. Leon T
Thats what I thought, just wanted to confirm
